titles.title: Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives regarding the establishment of a National Day of Remembrance.
Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives regarding the establishment of a National Day of Remembrance.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Reform.

bill.summary: This resolution expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that a National Day of Remembrance should be established to remember the insurrection that occurred on January 6, 2021, at the U.S. Capitol, and that the people of the United States should come together and ensure that such events never occur again in our country.
